When you try something offensive in a sancted room, you get the message below. It literally just needs a comma before my child. I've whined about it numerous times. Help me sleep at night!

Be at peace my child, there is no need to fight here.

This does happen in other places in the game. One I can remember is the Adventurer's Guild:

Rheteger says, "Very well Mogonis, I have removed you from your current assignment."

@Estild @Wyrom
